Class PrivateCommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.builder.CommandBuilder
      • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.builder.PrivateCommandBuilder
  • @Deprecated
public class PrivateCommandBuilder
extends CommandBuilder
    Deprecated.
    since the new command system doesn't support private commands
    Useful class that makes PrivateCommand creations more comfortable
